api_endpoints.name: post-/automation/v4/actions/callbacks/{callbackId}/complete_complete

description.tagline: Complete a specific blocked action execution by ID.
description.detailed: Call this tool to complete an action in an automation workflow that is currently blocked by its ID.

arguments.name: action_execution_id
arguments.description: The unique identifier of the action execution to be completed.

arguments.name: action_output_fields
arguments.description: JSON object with output fields for the action. Structure according to the action requirements.

api_endpoints.summary: Completes a callback
api_endpoints.description: Complete a specific blocked action execution by ID.

path.name: callbackId

value_schema.description: The ID of the action execution.

path.description: The ID of the action execution.

api_endpoints.name: post-/automation/v4/actions/callbacks/complete_completeBatch

description.tagline: Complete a batch of blocked action executions.
description.detailed: Use this tool to mark a batch of previously blocked action executions as complete. Ideal for situations where action executions need to be finalized as part of an automated workflow.

arguments.name: batch_actions_to_complete
arguments.description: JSON array containing objects with 'callbackId' and 'outputFields' to specify which action executions to complete.

api_endpoints.summary: Complete a batch of callbacks
api_endpoints.description: Complete a batch of blocked action executions.

wrapper_tool.name: fetch_email_campaigns

description.tagline: Fetch email campaigns from HubSpot Automation.
description.detailed: Use this tool to retrieve information about email campaigns managed within HubSpot's automation platform. It can be called to get an overview of current or past email marketing activities.

wrapper_tool.return_annotation: Details of email campaigns from HubSpot.

arguments.name: start_date
arguments.description: Specify the start date for fetching email campaigns. This should be in the format YYYY-MM-DD to filter results starting after this date.

arguments.name: end_date_filter
arguments.description: A timestamp filter to get campaigns before a specific date (in YYYY-MM-DD format).

arguments.name: max_results
arguments.description: Specifies the maximum number of email campaign entries to retrieve. Should be an integer value.

arguments.name: email_campaign_flow_ids
arguments.description: An array of flow IDs to specify which email campaigns to retrieve. Each ID should be a string.

description.detailed: This tool allows you to fetch information about workflows in HubSpot. Use it when you need to access or manage workflow details for automation purposes.

arguments.name: workflow_inputs
arguments.description: A JSON array containing details of workflows to be retrieved. Each element must be a JSON object with necessary attributes required for HubSpot workflows.

description.tagline: Retrieve HubSpot workflow ID mappings in batch.
description.detailed: Call this tool to obtain mappings for HubSpot workflow IDs in batch. Useful for integrating workflows and managing automation processes.

arguments.name: workflow_mappings_inputs
arguments.description: A JSON array containing workflow mapping input objects for batch processing.

api_endpoints.name: get-/automation/v4/sequences/enrollments/contact/{contactId}

wrapper_tool.name: check_contact_enrollment_status

description.tagline: Retrieve the sequence enrollment status of a contact by ID.
description.detailed: Use this tool to find out if a contact is enrolled in any sequences, using their contact ID to get the status information.

wrapper_tool.return_annotation: Enrollment status of a contact in sequences.

arguments.name: contact_id
arguments.description: The unique ID of the contact to check their sequence enrollment status.

api_endpoints.summary: Retrieve the enrollment status of a contact
api_endpoints.description: Get the enrollment status of a contact in sequences by their contact ID.

api_endpoints.name: get-/automation/v4/sequences/

wrapper_tool.name: get_user_sequences

description.tagline: Retrieve a list of sequences for a specific user.
description.detailed: Use this tool to get sequences associated with a user in HubSpot. Useful for tracking user-specific automated processes.

wrapper_tool.return_annotation: List of sequences belonging to a specific user.

api_endpoints.summary: Retrieve a list of sequences for a user
api_endpoints.description: Retrieve a list of sequences that belong to a specific user.

api_endpoints.name: post-/automation/v4/sequences/enrollments

wrapper_tool.name: enroll_contact_in_sequence

description.tagline: Enroll a contact into a sequence with user ID and details.
description.detailed: This tool enrolls a specified contact into an automation sequence using the provided user ID and sequence details, facilitating automated follow-up actions.

wrapper_tool.return_annotation: Confirms the contact's enrollment in the sequence.

arguments.name: contact_id
arguments.description: The unique identifier of the contact to be enrolled in the sequence.

arguments.name: sender_email
arguments.description: The email address of the sender enrolling the contact. This should be a valid email associated with the sender's HubSpot user account.

arguments.name: sequence_identifier
arguments.description: The unique identifier of the sequence to enroll the contact into. It should be a valid string matching the sequence available in the system.

arguments.name: sender_alias_address
arguments.description: Email alias for the sender addressing the sequence. This is used instead of the default email address.

api_endpoints.summary: Enroll a contact in a sequence
api_endpoints.description: Enroll a contact into a sequence using the specified user ID and sequence details.

api_endpoints.name: get-/automation/v4/sequences/{sequenceId}

description.tagline: Retrieve details of a specific sequence by its ID.
description.detailed: This tool retrieves information about a specific sequence using its ID. It should be called when you need details about a sequence within HubSpot Automation.

arguments.name: sequence_id
arguments.description: The unique ID of the sequence to retrieve details for. This ID identifies which sequence's information will be returned.

api_endpoints.summary: Retrieve details for a sequence
api_endpoints.description: Retrieve details of a specific sequence by its ID.

scopes.automation: Read from and write to my Workflows
scopes.automation.sequences.enrollments.write: Permission to write sequences enrollments data
